summary: REQ-33 appears partially implemented: ServicesPage now renders from dreamonomyCopy.services.sections and removes the old grid/CTA, but it hard-codes rendering per section.id and prefixes headings with numbering. REQ-32 appears not fully satisfied: dreamonomyCopy.services still includes non-user-provided content/structure such as a "categories" array and additional hero subtitle/marketing phrasing that is not evidenced as strictly the provided SERVICES copy.

missing_requirements.requirement: dreamonomyCopy.services contains only the user-provided “SERVICES / Our Learning Services” content (no placeholder/generic services content such as category cards or generic CTA copy), structured for nested lists.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows dreamonomyCopy.services still includes a "categories" array with card-like items (and an extra "Career Guidance" item) and a hero.subtitle/extra marketing phrasing; this contradicts the requirement to replace placeholder/generic services content with only the user-provided SERVICES content/structure.

missing_requirements.requirement: Services copy is structured so the Services page can render nested lists (sections -> bullet lists) without hard-coding content in the page component.
missing_requirements.reason: Although sections are present, ServicesPage rendering is implemented via conditional blocks keyed by section.id (e.g., core-academic, interdisciplinary), indicating the page is still hard-coding section-specific structure rather than generically rendering nested lists from data.

missing_requirements.requirement: The Services page displays the specified visible section headings (exact headings) in order: “Our Learning Services”, “Core Academic Subjects (Elementary K–10)”, “Out-of-Syllabus & Interdisciplinary Learning (Our USP)”, “Responsible AI Education for Children”, “Subject Journaling & Emotional Tracking”, and “Personalised Growth & Mentorship Programs”.
missing_requirements.reason: ServicesPage prefixes headings with numbering ("{index + 1}. {section.title}"), so the visible headings are not exactly the specified strings; also, due to truncation, not all required headings can be verified as present and in order.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a simplified Services "categories" card list (including "Career Guidance") under dreamonomyCopy.services, intended for homepage preview/backward compatibility.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest REQ-32 requires replacing services content with only the user-provided “Our Learning Services” structure and explicitly removing placeholder/generic category cards; a categories grid for preview (and an extra Career Guidance item) is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added additional hero copy fields/phrasing under services.hero (e.g., subtitle "A holistic, future-ready education model" and intro sentence) beyond the specified requirement of using only the user-provided SERVICES copy.
hallucinated_features.reason: Constraints/AC state only the user-provided SERVICES copy should appear for Services content; the diff shows added/altered marketing phrasing not evidenced as user-provided.

hallucinated_features.description: Prefixed Services section headings with numeric ordering ("1. ", "2. ", etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Numbered headings are not requested and may violate the acceptance criterion that headings match the specified visible strings.
